env HOME=$WORK/home

gunk convert util.proto
cmp util.gunk util.gunk.golden

! gunk convert util2.proto
stderr 'error: util2.proto:13:1: Event_Source redeclared in this block'

gunk convert util3.proto
cmp util3.gunk util3.gunk.golden

-- util.proto --
syntax = "proto3";

package util;

message Event {
	message Source {
		string name = 1;
	}
	Source source = 1;
	bool received = 2; 
}

message Source {
	string name = 1;
}
-- util.gunk.golden --
package util

type Event_Source struct {
	Name string `pb:"1" json:"name"`
}

type Event struct {
	Source   Event_Source `pb:"1" json:"source"`
	Received bool         `pb:"2" json:"received"`
}

type Source struct {
	Name string `pb:"1" json:"name"`
}
-- util2.proto --
syntax = "proto3";

package util;

message Event {
	message Source {
		string name = 1;
	}
	Source source = 1;
	bool received = 2; 
}

message Event_Source {
	string name = 1;
}
-- util3.proto --
syntax = "proto3";

package util;

message Foo {
	enum Status {
		UNKNOWN = 0;
	}
}

message Bar {
	enum Available {
		UNKNOWN = 0;
	}
}
-- util3.gunk.golden --
package util

type Status int

const (
	UNKNOWN Status = iota
)

type Foo struct {
}

type Available int

const (
	Available_UNKNOWN Available = iota
)

type Bar struct {
}
